solution_line_template: Edmund can wrap {wrapper_per_day}/{wrapper_per_box} = <<{wrapper_per_day}/{wrapper_per_box}={boxes_per_day}>>{boxes_per_day} gift boxes per day.
Therefore, he will be able to wrap {boxes_per_day} x {num_days}= <<{boxes_per_day}*{num_days}={total_boxes}>>{total_boxes} gift boxes every {num_days} days.
